molecular.statistics.time_series.acorr¶

molecular.statistics.time_series.acorr(a)[source]¶

Compute the lagged autocorrelation of an observation \(a\).

\[\rho(k) = \frac{\gamma(k)}{\gamma(0)}\]

The function \(\gamma\) is from acov.

Parameters

a (numpy.ndarray) – 1D array.

Returns

Autocorrelation function

Return type

numpy.ndarray

molecular
